segment.source: Results for the File Handling assessment
segment.target: Results for the File Handling assessment

segment.source: Results for the File Handling assessment
segment.target: Results for the File Handling assessment

segment.source: Results for the File Handling assessment
segment.target: Results for the File Handling assessment

segment.source: The File Handling assessment provides an automated way to exercise common file operations and capture metrics.
segment.target: The File Handling assessment provides an automated way to exercise common file operations and capture metrics.

segment.source: This assessment measures durations and throughput while copying, moving, compressing, extracting, and deleting files and folders on your computer.
segment.target: This assessment measures durations and throughput while copying, moving, compressing, extracting, and deleting files and folders on your computer.

segment.source: The results help you understand how well the computer performs during these operations.
segment.target: The results help you understand how well the computer performs during these operations.

segment.source: In this topic:
segment.target: In this topic:

segment.source: Goals File
segment.target: Goals File

segment.source: Metrics
segment.target: Metrics

segment.source: Issues
segment.target: Issues

segment.source: For more information about the system requirements, workloads, and assessment settings, see File Handling.
segment.target: For more information about the system requirements, workloads, and assessment settings, see File Handling.

segment.source: Goals File
segment.target: Goals File

segment.source: You can create custom goals to measure your improvements in the Results View.
segment.target: You can create custom goals to measure your improvements in the Results View.

segment.source: Goals files are a triage tool that can help you understand how a PC is performing and to compare PCs in your business.
segment.target: Goals files are a triage tool that can help you understand how a PC is performing and to compare PCs in your business.

segment.source: For example, goals for a basic laptop might be different than the goals you set for a high end desktop computer, or market expectations might change in such a way that you want the flexibility to define different goals and key requirements as time passes and technology improves.
segment.target: For example, goals for a basic laptop might be different than the goals you set for a high end desktop computer, or market expectations might change in such a way that you want the flexibility to define different goals and key requirements as time passes and technology improves.

segment.source: When a metric value is compared to the goal for that metric, the status is color coded in the Result View as follows:
segment.target: When a metric value is compared to the goal for that metric, the status is color coded in the Result View as follows:

segment.source: Light purple means that the system has a great user experience and that there are no perceived problems.
segment.target: Light purple means that the system has a great user experience and that there are no perceived problems.

segment.source: Medium purple means that the user experience is tolerable and you can optimize the system.
segment.target: Medium purple means that the user experience is tolerable and you can optimize the system.

segment.source: Review the recommendations and analysis to see what improvements can be made to the system.
segment.target: Review the recommendations and analysis to see what improvements can be made to the system.

segment.source: These can be software changes, configuration changes or hardware changes.
segment.target: These can be software changes, configuration changes or hardware changes.

segment.source: Dark purple means that the system has a poor user experience and that there is significant room for improvements.
segment.target: Dark purple means that the system has a poor user experience and that there is significant room for improvements.

segment.source: Review the recommendations and analysis to see the improvements that can be made to the system.
segment.target: Review the recommendations and analysis to see the improvements that can be made to the system.

segment.source: These can be software changes, configuration changes or hardware changes.
segment.target: These can be software changes, configuration changes or hardware changes.

segment.source: You might have to consider making tradeoffs to deliver a high quality Windows experience.
segment.target: You might have to consider making tradeoffs to deliver a high quality Windows experience.

segment.source: No color means that there are no goals defined for the metric.
segment.target: No color means that there are no goals defined for the metric.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: In the Windows Assessment Toolkit for Windows 8, some assessments include default goals files.
segment.target: In the Windows Assessment Toolkit for Windows 8, some assessments include default goals files.

segment.source: The first time you view results using this version of the tools, the default goals file is used.
segment.target: The first time you view results using this version of the tools, the default goals file is used.

segment.source: However, you can also define custom goals for Windows 8 the same way that you can for Windows 8.1 and Windows 10.
segment.target: However, you can also define custom goals for Windows 8 the same way that you can for Windows 8.1 and Windows 10.

segment.source: You can set the goals file location and add a goals file to that location before you can use the UI to apply the custom goals.
segment.target: You can set the goals file location and add a goals file to that location before you can use the UI to apply the custom goals.

segment.source: Once a goals file is selected it will continue to be the goals file that is used for any results that are opened.
segment.target: Once a goals file is selected it will continue to be the goals file that is used for any results that are opened.

segment.source: Only one goals file can be used at a time.
segment.target: Only one goals file can be used at a time.

segment.source: Goals for all assessments are set in a single goals file.
segment.target: Goals for all assessments are set in a single goals file.

segment.source: The assessment tools will search for goals in the following order:
segment.target: The assessment tools will search for goals in the following order:

segment.source: A custom goals file
segment.target: A custom goals file

segment.source: Goals that are defined in the results file
segment.target: Goals that are defined in the results file

segment.source: Goals that are defined in the assessment manifest
segment.target: Goals that are defined in the assessment manifest

segment.source: You can use the sample goals file that is provided at %PROGRAMFILES%Windows Kits10Assessment and Deployment KitWindows Assessment ToolkitSDKSamplesGoals to create your own goals file.
segment.target: You can use the sample goals file that is provided at %PROGRAMFILES%Windows Kits10Assessment and Deployment KitWindows Assessment ToolkitSDKSamplesGoals to create your own goals file.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You cannot package a goals file with a job, but you can store it on a share for others to use.
segment.target: You cannot package a goals file with a job, but you can store it on a share for others to use.

segment.source: Metrics
segment.target: Metrics

segment.source: The results for the File Handling assessment show the performance of the computer for copy, move, compress, and delete operations.
segment.target: The results for the File Handling assessment show the performance of the computer for copy, move, compress, and delete operations.

segment.source: The following table describes the metrics that the File Handling assessment measures.
segment.target: The following table describes the metrics that the File Handling assessment measures.

segment.source: Metric
segment.target: Metric

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Copy Duration (Programmatic)
segment.target: Copy Duration (Programmatic)

segment.source: Shows the number of seconds that the programmatic copy operation took to finish.
segment.target: Shows the number of seconds that the programmatic copy operation took to finish.

segment.source: Copy Duration (UX Scripted)
segment.target: Copy Duration (UX Scripted)

segment.source: Shows the number of seconds that the scripted copy operation took to finish.
segment.target: Shows the number of seconds that the scripted copy operation took to finish.

segment.source: Copy Throughput (Programmatic)
segment.target: Copy Throughput (Programmatic)

segment.source: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the programmatic copy operation.
segment.target: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the programmatic copy operation.

segment.source: Copy Throughput (UX Scripted)
segment.target: Copy Throughput (UX Scripted)

segment.source: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the scripted copy operation.
segment.target: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the scripted copy operation.

segment.source: Delete Duration (Programmatic)
segment.target: Delete Duration (Programmatic)

segment.source: Shows the number of seconds that the programmatic delete operation took to finish.
segment.target: Shows the number of seconds that the programmatic delete operation took to finish.

segment.source: Delete Duration (UX Scripted)
segment.target: Delete Duration (UX Scripted)

segment.source: Shows the number of seconds that the scripted delete operation took to finish.
segment.target: Shows the number of seconds that the scripted delete operation took to finish.

segment.source: Delete File Throughput (Programmatic)
segment.target: Delete File Throughput (Programmatic)

segment.source: Shows the file throughput, in files per second, for the programmatic delete operation.
segment.target: Shows the file throughput, in files per second, for the programmatic delete operation.

segment.source: Delete Throughput (Programmatic)
segment.target: Delete Throughput (Programmatic)

segment.source: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the programmatic delete operation.
segment.target: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the programmatic delete operation.

segment.source: Delete Throughput (UX Scripted)
segment.target: Delete Throughput (UX Scripted)

segment.source: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the scripted delete operation.
segment.target: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the scripted delete operation.

segment.source: File Handling
segment.target: File Handling

segment.source: Provides an overview that shows the length of time that common file operations (such as copy, move, compress, and delete) took to finish.
segment.target: Provides an overview that shows the length of time that common file operations (such as copy, move, compress, and delete) took to finish.

segment.source: To see detailed metrics for file handling, expand the result.
segment.target: To see detailed metrics for file handling, expand the result.

segment.source: File Organization Metrics
segment.target: File Organization Metrics

segment.source: Shows the length of time that programmatic script operations (such as copy, move, compress, and delete) took to finish, and includes the following throughput for each operation:
segment.target: Shows the length of time that programmatic script operations (such as copy, move, compress, and delete) took to finish, and includes the following throughput for each operation:

segment.source: Copy Duration (Programmatic) MinifilterDelay (seconds)
segment.target: Copy Duration (Programmatic) MinifilterDelay (seconds)

segment.target: Delete Duration (Programmatic) MinifilterDelay (seconds)

segment.target: Move Duration (Programmatic) MinifilterDelay (seconds)

segment.target: Copy Throughput (Programmatic) (megabytes per second)

segment.target: Delete Throughput (Programmatic) (megabytes per second)

segment.target: Move Throughput (Programmatic) (megabytes per second)

segment.source: Move Duration (Programmatic)
segment.target: Move Duration (Programmatic)

segment.source: Shows the number of seconds that the programmatic move operation took to finish.
segment.target: Shows the number of seconds that the programmatic move operation took to finish.

segment.source: Move Duration (UX Scripted)
segment.target: Move Duration (UX Scripted)

segment.source: Shows the number of seconds that the scripted move operation took to finish.
segment.target: Shows the number of seconds that the scripted move operation took to finish.

segment.source: Move File Throughput (Programmatic)
segment.target: Move File Throughput (Programmatic)

segment.source: Shows the file throughput, in files per second, for the programmatic move operation.
segment.target: Shows the file throughput, in files per second, for the programmatic move operation.

segment.source: Move File Throughput (UX Scripted)
segment.target: Move File Throughput (UX Scripted)

segment.source: Shows the file throughput, in files per second, for the scripted move operation.
segment.target: Shows the file throughput, in files per second, for the scripted move operation.

segment.source: Move Throughput (Programmatic)
segment.target: Move Throughput (Programmatic)

segment.source: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the programmatic move operation.
segment.target: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the programmatic move operation.

segment.source: Move Throughput (UX Scripted)
segment.target: Move Throughput (UX Scripted)

segment.source: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the scripted move operation.
segment.target: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the scripted move operation.

segment.source: Zip Duration (UX Scripted)
segment.target: Zip Duration (UX Scripted)

segment.source: Shows the number of seconds that the scripted compress operation took to finish.
segment.target: Shows the number of seconds that the scripted compress operation took to finish.

segment.source: Zip Throughput (UX Scripted)
segment.target: Zip Throughput (UX Scripted)

segment.source: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the scripted compress operation.
segment.target: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the scripted compress operation.

segment.source: Un-Zip Duration (UX Scripted)
segment.target: Un-Zip Duration (UX Scripted)

segment.source: Shows the number of seconds that the scripted extract operation took to finish.
segment.target: Shows the number of seconds that the scripted extract operation took to finish.

segment.source: Un-Zip Throughput (UX Scripted)
segment.target: Un-Zip Throughput (UX Scripted)

segment.source: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the scripted extract operation.
segment.target: Shows the throughput, in megabytes per second, for the scripted extract operation.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If you enabled the Enable Minifilter Diagnostic Mode assessment setting, the assessment results will include minifilter metrics.
segment.target: If you enabled the Enable Minifilter Diagnostic Mode assessment setting, the assessment results will include minifilter metrics.

segment.source: For more information about minifilter metrics and results, see Minifilter Diagnostics.
segment.target: For more information about minifilter metrics and results, see Minifilter Diagnostics.

segment.source: Issues
segment.target: Issues

segment.source: The assessment reports an exit code of 0x80050006
segment.target: The assessment reports an exit code of 0x80050006

segment.source: This error occurs when maintenance tasks have been registered on the PC but have not completed before the assessment run.
segment.target: This error occurs when maintenance tasks have been registered on the PC but have not completed before the assessment run.

segment.source: This prevents the assessment from running, as maintenance tasks often impact assessment metrics.
segment.target: This prevents the assessment from running, as maintenance tasks often impact assessment metrics.

segment.source: To resolve this issue, do one of the following:
segment.target: To resolve this issue, do one of the following:

segment.source: Ensure that the computer is connected to a network and is running on AC power.
segment.target: Ensure that the computer is connected to a network and is running on AC power.

segment.source: Manually initiate pending maintenance tasks with the following command from an elevated prompt:
segment.target: Manually initiate pending maintenance tasks with the following command from an elevated prompt:

segment.source: Disable regular and idle maintenance tasks, and stop all maintenance tasks before running the assessment.
segment.target: Disable regular and idle maintenance tasks, and stop all maintenance tasks before running the assessment.
